com.aptima.netstorm.algorithms.aptima.bp

Class BPMathModelRelation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aptima.netstorm.algorithms.aptima.bp.network.AdjacencyListRelation
      • com.aptima.netstorm.algorithms.aptima.bp.network.AttributedModelRelation
        • com.aptima.netstorm.algorithms.aptima.bp.BPMathModelRelation

  • public class BPMathModelRelation
extends AttributedModelRelation

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BPMathModelRelation(AttributedModelRelation baseRelation)
      Constructor takes in parameters of the relation within the graph to make a BPMathModelRelation so that it can be used in belief propagation (BP).

    • Constructor Detail

      • BPMathModelRelation

        public BPMathModelRelation(AttributedModelRelation baseRelation)
        Constructor takes in parameters of the relation within the graph to make a BPMathModelRelation so that it can be used in belief propagation (BP). It sets the following: 1) Unique ID 2) From Node 3) To Node 4) Optional set of attributes that are associated with this relation
        Parameters:
        baseRelation - An AttributedModelRelation which is the actual relation as it is in the Model graph

    • Method Detail

      • getBaseRelation

        public AdjacencyListRelation getBaseRelation()
        Method gets the relation from the Model Graph
        Returns:
        An AttributedModelRelation that holds the information of the link as it is represented in the Model Graph

        public int getModelID()
        Method gets the ID of the relation
        Returns:
        Integer that is the relation ID

        public void setLink(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> link)
        Set the mismatches for the outgoing relations
        Parameters:
        link - ArrayList that sets the mismatches for the outgoing relation

      • getLink

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> getLink()
        Get the mismatches between this outgoing model relation and the outgoing Data Graph relations
        Returns:
        ArrayList that holds the mismatches computed between the outgoing model relation and Data relations

      • setLinkReverse

        public void setLinkReverse(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> linkRelation)
        Set the mismatches for the incoming relations
        Parameters:
        linkRelation - ArrayList that holds the mismatches computed between the incoming model relation and data relations

      • getLinkReverse

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> getLinkReverse()
        Get the mismatches between this incoming model relation and the incoming Data Graph relations
        Returns:
        ArrayList that holds the mismatches computed between the model relation and Data relations

      • initLLR

        public void initLLR(int dataCount)
        Method initializes the incoming and outgoing mismatches to 1.0 for the model relation and all data relations
        Parameters:
        dataCount - Integer that holds the number of relations in the data graph
